00039 class GrammarLevels {
00040 
00041  public:
00043   GrammarLevels(int n) : derivesInOne(n), derivesInMany(n) {} 
00044   friend ostream & operator<<(ostream &, const GrammarLevels &);
00045   void setDerive(NonTerminal *, NonTerminal *);
00046 
00047   bool areEquiv(NonTerminal *, NonTerminal *);
00048   bool canDerive(NonTerminal *, NonTerminal *);
00049 
00050   void makeClosure();
00051   int getDerivesInOneEdges() { return derivesInOne.getNumEdges(); } 
00052   int getDerivesInManyEdges() { return derivesInMany.getNumEdges(); } 
00053 
00054  private:
00060   class DerivesTable
00061   {
00062     public:
00063       DerivesTable(int);
00064       DerivesTable(const DerivesTable &);
00065       DerivesTable & operator=(const DerivesTable &);
00066 
00068       friend ostream & operator<<(ostream &out, const DerivesTable &dt)
00069       {
00070         const int N = dt.table.size();
00071         for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00072           out << setw(3) << i << ": ";
00073           for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
00074             out << (dt.table[i][j] ? "*" : " ");
00075           }
00076           out << endl;
00077         }
00078         return out;
00079       }
00080 
00081       /* Set the "x derives y" value to true */
00082       void setOrder(int x, int y) { table[x][y]=true; }
00083       /* Return true iff x derives y */
00084       bool getOrder(int x, int y) { return table[x][y]; }
00086       bool areEquiv(int x, int y) { return table[x][y] && table[y][x]; }
00087 
00088       bool getClosure();
00089 
00091       int getNumEdges()
00092       {
00093         const int N = table.size();
00094         int edgeCount=0;
00095         for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00096           for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
00097             if (table[i][j] && i!=j)
00098               edgeCount++;
00099           }
00100         }
00101         return edgeCount;
00102       }
00103 
00104 
00105     private:
00110       vector< vector<bool> > table;
00111   };
00112 
00114   DerivesTable derivesInOne;
00115 
00117   DerivesTable derivesInMany;
00118 
00119 };
